title: Himi 461
lyrics:
8.7.8.7.
1.
Kainga lotu, ‘ofa’aki
Homou hiva ki he ‘Eiki;
Fakamalō ki he Lami
Feia mei ‘itāniti:
Ko e ‘ofa ‘a e Tamai
Ki he maama mamahi n
i
.
2.
Hiva hono tālanga’i
Talu he kuonga mu’a;
Te’eki fokotu’u ‘a e langi,
Te’eki ngaohi ‘a e fonua:
Ke ne tau mo e mamahi
Ma’a e fānau ‘a e ‘Otua.
3.
Hiva ‘ene ta’emamae
‘Ene kau mo e ‘Otua,
Ka ne hifo pē ‘o mate
Ke huhu’i ‘a e pōpula;
‘O ne tō ‘i Kālevale
Ke kilala ‘a e fonua.
4.
Hiva ‘ene fakaava
Ma’a e tui pīkitai
Hala ki he pule’anga,
Ke tau fou ai ki he langi:
‘O ne foki kuo lava
Hotau ngaahi fili lah
i
.
5.
Hiva ‘ene toe foki
Ke nonofo mo
e
Tamai;
Mo ne tuku ha fetongi
Ke poupou ‘etau vaivai,
Laumālie Mā’oni’oni
He mata’ikoloa ‘o Lang
i
.
6.
Ha’u ke fai ‘a e fakamālō
He Tamai taupotu at
u
;
Hiva foki ki he ‘Alo
Na’e tautau ‘i he ‘Akau:
‘Uma’ā hotau Taukapo,
Ko e Laumālie Tap
u
. *
